textDirection.description: Direction in which the language is read, either 'ltr' or 'rtl' ('left to right' vs. 'right to left').

blockLinkPrefix.description: Anchor of the blocklist link, host name will be appended (e.g. 'Block wikipedia.org'). If given, should end with space.

blockLinkSuffix.description: Anchor of the blocklist link, host name will be prepended (e.g. 'wikipedia.org block'). If given, should start with space.

unblockLinkPrefix.description: Anchor of the link to remove domain from blocklist, host name will be appended (e.g. 'Unblock wikipedia.org'). If given, should end with space.

unblockLinkSuffix.description: Anchor of the link to remove domain from blocklist, host name will be prepended (e.g. 'wikipedia.org block'). If given, should start with space.

blocklistNotification.message: Некоторые результаты были заблокированы с помощью расширения для Google Personal Blocklist
blocklistNotification.description: Notification at bottom of page indicating that some results have been removed by the extension.

showBlockedLink.description: Anchor for the link to make blocked results visible.

block.description: Block link on the blocklist management pop-up.

unblock.description: Unblock link on the blocklist management pop-up.

edit.description: Edit link on the blocklist management pop-up.

ok.description: Confirmation button on the blocklist management pop-up.

cancel.description: Cancel button on the blocklist management pop-up.

nosites.message: Ни один домен/хост ещё не был заблокирован. Чтобы заблокировать кликните на ссылку 'Блокировать [домен/хост]' рядом с результатом поиска.

popupTitle.message: Домены/хосты, заблокированные в результатах поиска Google.
popupTitle.description: Title of the blocklist management pop-up window.

importInstructions.message: Введите список доменов для добавления (по одному в каждую строку):

exportInstructions.message: Скопируйте список в буфер обмена или экспортируйте в ваш Google аккаунт.

validPatternsMessage.description: Message that x patterns were added to blocklist.

noPatterns.description: Error message for an empty blocklist.

blockCurrent.description: Link text to block host of current tab url.

invalidPattern.description: Error message for editing a invalid pattern.

exportToGoogle.description: Text of the button that exports the blocklist to a Google account.

exportDialogMessage.message: Хотите ли вы отключить этот расширение после экспортирования списка в ваш аккаунт Google?
exportDialogMessage.description: Message in the export dialog box.

exportDialogTitle.description: Title in the export dialog box.

exportDialogYes.description: Option message in the export dialog box.

exportDialogNo.description: Option message in the export dialog box.
